metadata.name: UAC Bypass Using EventVwr
metadata.comment: Detects the pattern of a UAC bypass using Windows Event Viewer

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\microsoft\\\\event viewer\\\\recentviews')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\microsoft\\\\eventv~1\\\\recentviews'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the pattern of a UAC bypass using Windows Event Viewer
